hands joined

to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together

to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch

to open/to show (a ticket)/to turn on/to switch on

to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能开一张不可撤消的跟单信用证吗？

sentences.english: Use a little milk to soak the gelatine powder first.
sentences.chinese: 吉利丁先用少许牛奶浸泡开。

sentences.english: Those two ideas must be kept distinct from one another.
sentences.chinese: 必须把那两种思想区分开。

sentences.english: There, I've said it -- it feels so good to have that off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我已经说过能够脱离开书架让我感觉非常好。

sentences.english: The news of her divorce gradually rippled outwards.
sentences.chinese: 她离婚的消息渐渐向外传开。

sentences.english: This opens it to a brute-force attack over a network.
sentences.chinese: 这为网络上用暴力法攻击开了方便之门。

sentences.english: B：We want to open a US dollar account with your bank.
sentences.chinese: 我们想在贵行开一个美元账户。

sentences.english: I rang again and a maid with a sullen face opened the door .
sentences.chinese: 我又揿了一下门铃，一名侍女紧绷着脸把门开了。

sentences.english: This cook-shop was kept by some people named Thenardier, husband and wife.
sentences.chinese: 这客店是名叫德纳第的夫妇俩开的。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店员警告我说开门前最好先敲敲门，以便把它们吓跑。

sentences.english: They are too conscientious and responsible to drive like manias .
sentences.chinese: 妇女格外谨慎，责任心也强，不会像狂人一样开飞车。

sentences.english: I figured instead of killing other people, I’d just put the truck in the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我在想的是为了避免别人送命，我得将卡车开向路堤。

sentences.english: Doris:I think because I turned on the air conditioner right after showering and before I blow-dried my hair.
sentences.chinese: 大概是我刚刚洗完澡没吹头发又立刻开冷气的关系吧。

sentences.english: B----Oh, Come on, high cal is exactly the thing we need here!
sentences.chinese: 哦，开什么玩笑，高卡路里正是我们需要的。

sentences.english: I bought a ship. I will drive the ship.
If no returns, one-inch the hole.
sentences.chinese: 如果返高不够，开1英寸的小孔。
